local_intent: Align to the drawer handle, set yaw to 90°, close the gripper with force 20 to grasp, then verify stability.
assumptions: Handle is visible from current view
Gripper was pre-opened and is near pre-grasp pose
coherence_with_global: Matches the global grasp phase: align (tolerance 0.01, 1500 ms), set yaw 90°, close gripper with force 20 (1200 ms), then check grasp stability.
